quest.name: Pure Imagination
journal:
Uin Nee is expecting the unexpected.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: I've been trying to come up with new ways to help the children have fun and memorable dreams, but I'm struggling to come up with any ideas.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Ah! That's it! I'm thinking about this too much. I need something unexpected, something spontaneous. After all, dreams are by their very nature unpredictable! And I think I know the perfect place to search for inspiration.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: The rivers that flow from the east carry a whole hodgepodge of things from other lands, which collects in the waterfalls. Why not go and see what you can find?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: I could go myself, but I wouldn't want to deprive you of the chance to prove your usefulness. There's junk to be collected, so you'd best get to it!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: I'm not looking for anything in particular, I just need ideas!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You find an oddly smooth branch!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You find a fruit of the forest!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A phooka comes tumbling out of nowhere!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: So, did you come across anything surprising?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Hmm... That's a fine piece of...whatever it is. Porcelain, I think. Yes! I can transform it into a cup and host a tea party! We might need more than one cup, though.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: A branch? Not quite as unusual as I was hoping for, I must say. Bits of wood like this are rather commonplace in Il Mheg, you know. Still, it's about the right size for a magic wand. Perhaps the children can pretend to be wizards!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: What's this? Fruit of some description? I can't tell a pixieberry from my elbow, I have to say. Ah! If we plant this, it can grow into a great big tree, and we can make a treehouse!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Eh? A phooka nearly fell on you!? Rather you than me!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Still, it was worth all the trouble! It's strange to think something so mundane could lead to such a fantastic idea! Of course, we have my imagination to thank for that. Honestly, where would you be without me?
